meaningMnemonic: <radical>Dollar</radical>s and <radical>shellfish</radical> are used to pay <kanji>expense</kanji>s and <kanji>cost</kanji>s. Shellfish used to be used as currency, so they're like the coins that go with dollars.
readingMnemonic: What is the biggest <kanji>expense</kanji> and <kanji>cost</kanji>? It's the <reading>hea</reading>t (ひ) bill.
